statements: DELETE FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE employee_id = 101 AND progress_percent < 50.00;
DELETE FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE employee_name LIKE 'J%';
DELETE FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE employee_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND progress_percent < 50;
DELETE FROM ProgressHistory WHERE date_completed < '2023-01-01' AND completion_status = 'Incomplete';
DELETE FROM EmployeePerformance USING ProgressHistory WHERE EmployeePerformance.employee_id = ProgressHistory.employee_id AND ProgressHistory.completion_status = 'Completed';
DELETE FROM employee_training WHERE employee_id = 789 AND module_id = 101112;
DELETE FROM employee_training WHERE employee_id = 1 AND module_id = 2;
DELETE FROM employee_progress WHERE employee_id = 2 AND module_id = 5;
DELETE FROM progress_tracking WHERE employee_id = 2 AND module_id = 5;
DELETE FROM progress_tracking WHERE module_id = 3 AND employee_id = 5
